original_text: And he called the twelve and began to send them out two by two, and gave them authority over the unclean spirits.
korean_text: 열두 제자를 부르사 둘씩 둘씩 보내시며 더러운 귀신을 제어하는 권능을 주시고

sentences.original_text: and began to send them out two by two
and gave them authority over the unclean spirits.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 더러운 귀신들을 다스릴 권위를 주셨다
